title: Divine Nakshi Work Kante Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
features: Intricate Nakshi work showcasing traditional South Indian motifs. Layered design adorned with shimmering Zircon. Center pendants featuring Emerald and Ruby floral accents for a touch of regal elegance. Delicate gold ball drops add movement and charm. The entire piece exudes a vintage, antique finish, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad.
colors: Primarily gold with vibrant pops of green from the Emeralds and deep red from the Rubies. The Zircon adds a brilliant white sparkle
occasions: traditional ceremonies (like Seemantham or Half-Saree function)
or any festive occasion where a touch of traditional grandeur is desired. Can also be styled with modern Indian wear for a fusion look.
description: This Kante Haaram represents the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of Nakshi work, Emeralds, and Rubies makes it a timeless heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi Polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish, while the Zircon adds a modern touch of sparkle. It's a statement piece that exudes tradition, luxury, and enduring beauty. An excellent investment for future generations.
